record.title: NATIONAL AMERICORPS WEEK
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 385, in which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Kentucky (Mr. Yarmuth) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 385.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 344, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
